name: UIImagePickerControllerDelegate
desc: A set of methods that your delegate object must implement to interact with the image picker interface.

items.name: func imagePickerController(UIImagePickerController, didFinishPickingMediaWithInfo: [UIImagePickerController.InfoKey : Any])
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the user picked a still image or movie.

items.name: func imagePickerControllerDidCancel(UIImagePickerController)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the user cancelled the pick operation.

items.name: struct UIImagePickerController.InfoKey
items.desc: Keys you use to retrieve information from the editing dictionary about the media that the user selected.
